name: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4信息泄露漏洞（CNVD-2025-29078）
product: ["Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2 <=1.19.5", "Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4 <=1.19.5"]
description: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4都是美国Azure Access Technology公司的一种网络门禁控制器。Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4存在安全漏洞，该漏洞源于缺乏身份验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞获取敏感信息。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://azure-access.com/cve-2025-12476/
patch: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4信息泄露漏洞（CNVD-2025-29078）的补丁
